items.name: Taco Tuesday
items.description:
Tacos — $3 | Burrito — $12 | Burrito Bowl — $14
Chicken, Steak, Fish, Pork, Pastor, Veggie
For Shrimp or Tongue add $1

items.name: WTF Wednesday
items.description: WHO THE F#$% Knows? Ask your server.

items.name: Smoked Saturday
items.description:
Ribs, Salmon, Pork, or Brisket Plate with 1 side — $19
Sandwich with fries — $16

items.name: Beer
items.description: We have several rotating taps of micro, macro, nano, regional breweries and everything in between. Plus numerous varieties of 12–19oz canned beer, agua fresca, hard kombucha, cider and cocktails.

items.name: Wine
items.description: Wine available by glass or bottle. Beer and wine also offered to go.
